title: Ends of (singular) Ricci shrinkers
abstract:
We estimate the number of ends of smooth and singular Ricci shrinkers
focussing first on general ends and later on asymptotically conical ones. In
particular, we obtain a variety of applications to sequences of Ricci shrinkers
converging in a weak pointed sense to a possibly singular limit Ricci shrinker,
for instance no new conical end can form in the limit.
